14
15#ifndef DNS_RCODE_H
16#define DNS_RCODE_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/rcode.h */
19
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21
22#include <dns/types.h>
23
24ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
25
26isc_result_t dns_rcode_fromtext(dns_rcode_t *rcodep, isc_textregion_t *source);
27/*%<
28 * Convert the text 'source' refers to into a DNS error value.
29 *
30 * Requires:
31 *\li 'rcodep' is a valid pointer.
32 *
33 *\li 'source' is a valid text region.
34 *
35 * Returns:
36 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
37 *\li #DNS_R_UNKNOWN type is unknown
38 */
39
40isc_result_t dns_rcode_totext(dns_rcode_t rcode, isc_buffer_t *target);
41/*%<
42 * Put a textual representation of error 'rcode' into 'target'.
43 *
44 * Requires:
45 *\li 'rcode' is a valid rcode.
46 *
47 *\li 'target' is a valid text buffer.
48 *
49 * Ensures:
50 *\li If the result is success:
51 * The used space in 'target' is updated.
52 *
53 * Returns:
54 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
55 *\li #ISC_R_NOSPACE target buffer is too small
56 */
57
58isc_result_t dns_tsigrcode_fromtext(dns_rcode_t *rcodep,
59 isc_textregion_t *source);
60/*%<
61 * Convert the text 'source' refers to into a TSIG/TKEY error value.
62 *
63 * Requires:
64 *\li 'rcodep' is a valid pointer.
65 *
66 *\li 'source' is a valid text region.
67 *
68 * Returns:
69 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
70 *\li #DNS_R_UNKNOWN type is unknown
71 */
72
73isc_result_t dns_tsigrcode_totext(dns_rcode_t rcode, isc_buffer_t *target);
74/*%<
75 * Put a textual representation of TSIG/TKEY error 'rcode' into 'target'.
76 *
77 * Requires:
78 *\li 'rcode' is a valid TSIG/TKEY error code.
79 *
80 *\li 'target' is a valid text buffer.
81 *
82 * Ensures:
83 *\li If the result is success:
84 * The used space in 'target' is updated.
85 *
86 * Returns:
87 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
88 *\li #ISC_R_NOSPACE target buffer is too small
89 */
90
91isc_result_t
92dns_hashalg_fromtext(unsigned char *hashalg, isc_textregion_t *source);
93/*%<
94 * Convert the text 'source' refers to into a has algorithm value.
95 *
96 * Requires:
97 *\li 'hashalg' is a valid pointer.
98 *
99 *\li 'source' is a valid text region.
100 *
101 * Returns:
102 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
103 *\li #DNS_R_UNKNOWN type is unknown
104 */
105
106ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
107
108#endif /* DNS_RCODE_H */
109
